Package Coords

Class ConvertGpsToXyz

  • java.lang.Object
    • Coords.ConvertGpsToXyz
  • public class ConvertGpsToXyz
extends java.lang.Object
    This class converts a Decimal degrees latitude longitude altitude point, into a ECEF(earth-centered, earth-fixed) x,y,z point and the other way around. ECEF wiki link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ECEF
    Author:
    Alex Vaisman , Shay naor

      static Point3D ecef2lla​(Point3D vec)
      converting a ECEF x,y,z point in meters to lla (latitude longitude altitude)point.
      static Point3D lla2ecef​(Point3D vec)
      Converts a lla point into a ECEF x,y,z point.

    • Method Detail

      • ecef2lla

        public static Point3D ecef2lla​(Point3D vec)
        converting a ECEF x,y,z point in meters to lla (latitude longitude altitude)point. The formula taken from : https://stackoverflow.com/questions/18253546/ecef-to-lla-lat-lon-alt-in-java.
        Parameters:
        vec - the x,y,z point the function receives.
        Returns:
        lla point

      • lla2ecef

        public static Point3D lla2ecef​(Point3D vec)
        Converts a lla point into a ECEF x,y,z point. The formula taken from : http://mathforum.org/library/drmath/view/51832.html.
        Parameters:
        vec - The lla point the function receives.
        Returns:
        ECEF point.
